Package app.Models

Class Descriptor

java.lang.Object
app.Models.Descriptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI, Serializable
public class Descriptor extends Object implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI
Represents the information descriptor for a node within a sensor network. This class implements the NodeInfoI interface, providing details such as the node identifier, network endpoint information, positional data, and the node's range. Additionally, it handles peer-to-peer endpoint information for network communications.
See Also:

      public Descriptor(String nodeIdentifier, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.EndPointDescriptorI endPointInfo, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI nodePosition, double nodeRange, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.EndPointDescriptorI p2pEndPointInfo)
      Constructs a Descriptor with detailed information about a network node.
      Parameters:
      nodeIdentifier - The unique identifier of the node.
      endPointInfo - The standard endpoint descriptor for the node.
      nodePosition - The position of the node as a PositionI object.
      nodeRange - The communication or sensor range of the node.
      p2pEndPointInfo - The endpoint descriptor for peer-to-peer communications.
